thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Fosun Intends To Purchase Majority Stake In Wolford AG

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Fosun Intends To Purchase Majority Stake In Wolford AG
text:
March 1 (Reuters) - Wolford AG:
* EANS-ADHOC: FOSUN INTENDS TO PURCHASE MAJORITY STAKE IN WOLFORD AG AND TO CO ...
* ‍TAKEOVER OFFER TO SHAREHOLDERS IS EXPECTED​ * FOSUN INTENDS TO COMMIT TO SUBSCRIBE FOR CASH CAPITAL INCREASE OF WOLFORD FROM EUR 36.35 MILLION TO EUR 48.85 MILLION
* ‍EXPECTED PURCHASE PRICE AMOUNTS TO EUR 12.80 PER SHARE​ * ISSUE PRICE OF CAPITAL INCREASE OF EUR 12.80 PER NEW SHARE
* CLOSING OF SHARE PURCHASE AGREEMENT AND GENERAL MEETING INTENDED TO TAKE PLACE IN MAY 2018
* ‍FOSUN COMMITS TO SUBSCRIBE FOR A CAPITAL INCREASE OF EUR 22 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: (Gdynia Newsroom)
